animeDescription: The first series is a set of 25 stories about a male businessman arriving at the hotel after taking a train home from work. He encounters the mysterious owner of the hotel, an old mouse known as Gregory, who suggests that he stay a while. Soon, the man becomes drawn into a bizarre series of events taking place within Gregory House as he tries desperately to escape from this bizarre purgatory.(Source: Wikipedia)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Gregory Horror Show: Another World', 'Sequel: Gregory Horror Show: The Second Guest', 'Side story: Gregory Horror Show: The Bloody Karte']
